divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife and i were going to work at apx 11 pm. we work at the local post office. we were in different vehicles at the time. the wife was following behind me and i stoped to see the flying noisless massive black triangle with three huge lights on its bottom just above the trees about 300 feet directly in front of me. the craft was at a mans fast pace moving from my left to right. it then stoped, tilted, and flew west at a disapearing speed. we still talk about it. very cool. my other incounter was this year and i was outside at the post office taking my break. when a light appeared in the sky like very large stare. the object then moved from a stationary spot from my right to left at a great speed, then stoped dead and disapeard. the next night on the same break the same object in the same place did the same thing. however the sky was very clear and the object after it stoped slowly flickered away as if going through a worm hole, which i believe they get here and back. this is no joke as i and wife are past 60 and have seen many a ornge balls, white balls and huge black triangles to convince us we sure are not the only ones in this universe. very cool.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Green Bay
There were no other sightings in Green Bay on or around June 26th 2012
Summary: hovering above post office at 11pm triangle, then stoped and gone
